author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

guild.description:
Laughing at the absurdity of society one post at a time. All political sides of the spectrum are welcome. Welcome to PoliticalHumor.
_____

#### Rules

_____

###### POSTS MUST BE BOTH DIRECTLY POLITICAL AND HUMOROUS

Funny content that is NOT political belong here:

* +Memes
* +DankMemes
* +DarkHumorAndMemes (NSFW)

Political posts that are NOT humorous belong here:

* +News
* +OpposingViewpoints
* +Politics
* +World_Politics

If you are looking for ONLY political memes, go here:

* +PoliticalMemes

_____

###### MARK NSFW FOR

* Antisemitism
* Racism

_____

###### NO HARASSMENT OR THREATS OF VIOLENCE

* Do not harass your fellow users.
* Do not threaten with violence or plan to execute unlawful violent activity and do not encourage others to do so.

_____

###### NO SPAM

* Do not flood this guild with rule-breaking or off-topic content.

_____

###### If you encounter rule-breaking content, report and downvote it. For a more accurate rule guide, see the pinned Guide to Posting.

body: If only he had kept the slavs out of it
